attributes.action: Stop Giving Foreign Aid To Countries That Execute People On Religious or "Social" Grounds
attributes.additional_details:
The last few weeks have seen a number of executions in India and other countries that we currently give foreign aid to.
For what reason? Several women have been subjected to violent rapes. This has been considered "socially unacceptable" by the communities that they live in resulting in the victims being executed.

We cannot continue to give foreign aid to countries with such atrocious Human Rights.

This country should NOT give foreign aid to ANY country that carries out executions on religious grounds or "social" grounds.
